briefTitle: A Single-Center Evaluation of the Relative Efficacy of EM-100 Compared to Zaditor® (Ketotifen Fumarate Ophthalmic Solution 0.035%) and Vehicle
officialTitle: A Single-Center Evaluation of the Relative Efficacy of EM-100 Compared to Zaditor® (Ketotifen Fumarate Ophthalmic Solution 0.035%) and Vehicle in the Treatment of Ocular Itching Associated With Allergic Conjunctivitis as Induced by the Conjunctival Allergen Challenge Model (Ora-CAC®)
summary: A Single-Center study to demonstrate the non-inferiority of EM-100 to Zaditor® in the treatment of ocular itching.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 3, 5 and 7 minutes post-Conjunctival Allergen Challenge (CAC) on Day 1
